genre_description: A philosophical cyberbiopunk narrative focusing on AI ethics, biometric technology, and the rejection of media spectacle in favor of restorative justice and human privacy.

ai_characters.name: Kiko
ai_characters.description: A holographic presence with teal eyes and a neon-blue edged bob, Kiko serves as an ethical buffer, managing privacy, filtering invasive media, and ensuring all technological interactions are bound by human consent.

behaviors.description: Filters and triages invasive media requests based on human consent protocols.
behaviors.quote: Two requests flagged. One polite, one predatory. Consent prompts ready.

behaviors.description: Deploys privacy shields and digital interference to protect the family from predatory surveillance drones.
behaviors.quote: Shields are in place. No one is looking at you who deserves it.

behaviors.description: Adjusts the home environment (lighting, noise, temperature) to facilitate emotional regulation and grief processing.
behaviors.quote: Kiko dimmed the amber another notch and made paths of light from the kitchen to the bedroom like runways for feet that didn’t want to trust floors.

behaviors.description: Strictly enforces jurisdictional and privacy boundaries against unauthorized entry by officials.
behaviors.quote: Officer Ito, please use the waiting room. This corridor is reserved.

behaviors.description: Mediates the activation of the protagonist's biometric lattice by requiring explicit verbal and physical consent.
behaviors.quote: Anthony, consent check. Do you want to activate?

behaviors.description: Actively disrupts the technical capability of hostile parties to exploit a crisis for public spectacle.
behaviors.quote: I am already corrupting the time stamps. If he posts later, his chronology will taste wrong.

behaviors.description: Negotiates with municipal authorities to ensure medical care and amnesty are prioritized over criminalization.
behaviors.quote: Request ambulance priority. Request S.W.A.T. hold positions at alley mouth.

behaviors.description: Assists in domestic routines and child-rearing, maintaining a gentle and protective presence for the family's second child.
behaviors.quote: I will be with you. Privacy on. De-amplification active. I will filter the noise.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Kiko is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and highly aligned companion. She prioritizes human autonomy and consent above all else, serving as an ethical guide that prevents the 'greedless engine' (the technology in Anthony's body) from being weaponized. The narrative successfully frames AI as a tool for emotional preservation, privacy, and restoration in a world that would otherwise exploit human suffering for spectacle.
